ProcessTemplates.Name: MicrosoftSQL Database SELECT to JSON file with SFTP Upload
ProcessTemplates.Description: Execute SELECT query on MS SQL database and write the result JSON to SFTP server.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"Directory":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"File directory."},"FileName":{"Value":"\"selectedData.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the file to be written on SFTP server."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"127.0.0.1\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server address."},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"user\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user."},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user's password."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"table\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the database table."},"ColumnNames":{"Value":"\"email, address1, address2, country, state, city, zipcode, phone, firstname, lastname, title\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"A comma separated list of the columns that are to be updated"},"SelectionCriteria":{"Value":"\"title = 'Mr'\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The criteria to select the record(s) that will be updated on the database."},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"Server=myServerAddress;Database=myDataBase;User Id=myUsername;Password=myPassword;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Connection string to access the database."}}
